peregrine.controller.rpcd.delegate
Class ControllerRPCDelegate

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.rpcd.delegate.RPCDelegate<ControllerDaemon>
      peregrine.controller.rpcd.delegate.ControllerRPCDelegate

public class ControllerRPCDelegate
extends RPCDelegate<ControllerDaemon>

Delegate for intercepting RPC messages.

                                                     org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,

Allows a worker node to report that a partition is complete and its mapper/reducers have executed correctly.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

failed

public org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer failed(ControllerDaemon controllerDaemon,
                                                   org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                   Message message)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Allows a worker node to report that a given partition has failed. This is usually done if the machine is functioning correctly. If not we mark the machine failed via other means (such as gossip).

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

progress

public org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer progress(ControllerDaemon controllerDaemon,
                                                     org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                     Message message)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
Allows a worker to tell a controller that a given chunk within a unit of work has been executed. This could be a chunk in a map task, a chunk position list in a merge, or an individual sort in a preemptive reduce sort or even the final reduce sort.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

heartbeat

public org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer heartbeat(ControllerDaemon controllerDaemon,
                                                      org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                      Message message)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
Allows the controller to receive 'heartbeats' from machines in the cluster so that it can obtain status on the cluster for which machines are 'out there' in the ether.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

gossip

public org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer gossip(ControllerDaemon controllerDaemon,
                                                   org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                   Message message)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Allows a worker node to report back that it failed to communicate / collaborate with a given host. The controller then receives these messages and can make informed decisions about which to mark offline.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

status

public org.jboss.netty.buffer.ChannelBuffer status(ControllerDaemon controllerDaemon,
                                                   org.jboss.netty.channel.Channel channel,
                                                   Message message)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Get the current controller status as a message/map from the controller including scheduler information.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
